009package imagingbook.common.regions;
010
011import java.awt.Rectangle;
012import java.util.Collections;
013import java.util.Iterator;
014import java.util.LinkedList;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
017
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntInt;
020
021/**
022 * Defines a binary region that is backed by the label array of a region
023 * segmentation. A {@link SegmentationBackedRegion} instance does not have its
024 * own list or array of contained pixel coordinates but refers to the label
025 * array of the associated {@link BinaryRegionSegmentation} instance.
026 * 
027 * @author WB
028 * @version 2020/12/21
029 */
030public class SegmentationBackedRegion extends BinaryRegion {
031
032        private final int label;                                                                        // the label of this region
033        private final BinaryRegionSegmentation segmentation;            // the segmentation backing this region
034        
035        private int size = 0;
036        private int left = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
037        private int right = -1;
038        private int top = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
039        private int bottom = -1;
040
041        private Contour outerContour = null;
042        private List<Contour> innerContours = null;
043
044        // summation variables used for various statistics
045        private long x1Sum = 0;
046        private long y1Sum = 0;
047        private long x2Sum = 0;
048        private long y2Sum = 0;
049        private long xySum = 0;
050
051        // ------- constructor --------------------------
052
053        /**
054         * Constructor.
055         * @param label the label (number) assigned to this region
056         * @param seg the backing region segmentation
057         */
058        SegmentationBackedRegion(int label, BinaryRegionSegmentation seg) {
059                this.label = label;
060                this.segmentation = seg;
061        }
062
063        // ------- public methods --------------------------
064
065        /**
066         * Returns the label (number) of this region.
067         * @return the region label
068         */
069        public int getLabel() {
070                return this.label;
071        }
072
073        @Override
074        public int getSize() {
075                return this.size;
076        }
077        
078        @Override
079        public long getX1Sum() {
080                return x1Sum;
081        }
082
083        @Override
084        public long getY1Sum() {
085                return y1Sum;
086        }
087
088        @Override
089        public long getX2Sum() {
090                return x2Sum;
091        }
092
093        @Override
094        public long getY2Sum() {
095                return y2Sum;
096        }
097
098        @Override
099        public long getXYSum() {
100                return xySum;
101        }
102
103        @Override
104        public Rectangle getBoundingBox() {
105                if (right < 0)
106                        return null;
107                else
108                        return new Rectangle(left, top, right-left + 1, bottom - top + 1);
109        }
110
111        @Override
112        public Iterator<Pnt2d> iterator() {
113                return new RegionPixelIterator();
114        }
115
116        /**
117         * Adds a single pixel to this region and updates summation
118         * and boundary variables used to calculate various region statistics.
119         * 
120         * @param u x-position
121         * @param v y-position
122         */
123        void addPixel(int u, int v) {
124                size = size + 1;
125                x1Sum = x1Sum + u;
126                y1Sum = y1Sum + v;
127                x2Sum = x2Sum + u * u;
128                y2Sum = y2Sum + v * v;
129                xySum = xySum + u * v;
130                if (u < left)   left = u;
131                if (v < top)    top = v;
132                if (u > right)  right = u;
133                if (v > bottom) bottom = v;
134        }
135
136        /**
137         * Updates the region's statistics. 
138         * Does nothing but may be overridden by inheriting classes.
139         */
140        void update() {
141        }
142
143        @Override
144        public Contour getOuterContour() {      // TODO: invoke some contour tracer if contour not available?
145                return outerContour;
146        }
147
148        @Override
149        void setOuterContour(Contour.Outer contr) {
150                outerContour = contr;
151        }
152
153        @Override
154        public List<Contour> getInnerContours() {
155                return (innerContours != null) ? innerContours : Collections.emptyList();
156//              return innerContours;
157        }
158
159        void addInnerContour(Contour.Inner contr) {
160                if (innerContours == null) {
161                        innerContours = new LinkedList<>();
162                }
163                innerContours.add(contr);
164        }
165
166        /**
167         * Checks if the given pixel position is contained in this
168         * {@link SegmentationBackedRegion} instance.
169         * @param u x-coordinate
170         * @param v y-coordinate
171         * @return true if (u,v) is contained in this region
172         */
173        @Override
174        public boolean contains(int u, int v) {
175                return segmentation.getLabel(u, v) == this.label;
176        }
177        
178        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
179
180        /**
181         * Instances of this class are returned by {@link SegmentationBackedRegion#iterator()},
182         * which implements  {@link Iterable} for instances of class {@link Pnt2d}.
183         */
184        private class RegionPixelIterator implements Iterator<Pnt2d> {
185                private final int label;                                        // the corresponding region's label
186                private final int uMin, uMax, vMin, vMax;       // coordinates of region's bounding box
187                private int uCur, vCur;                                         // current pixel position
188                private PntInt pNext;                                           // coordinates of the next region pixel
189                private boolean first;                                          // control flag
190
191                RegionPixelIterator() {
192                        label = SegmentationBackedRegion.this.getLabel();
193                        Rectangle bb = SegmentationBackedRegion.this.getBoundingBox();
194                        first = true;
195                        uMin = bb.x;
196                        uMax = bb.x + bb.width;
197                        vMin = bb.y;
198                        vMax = bb.y + bb.height;
199                        uCur = uMin;
200                        vCur = vMin;
201                        pNext = null;
202                }
203
204                /** 
205                 * Search from position (uCur, vCur) for the next valid region pixel.
206                 * Return the next position as a Point or null if no such point can be found.
207                 * Don't assume that (uCur, vCur) is a valid region pixel!
208                 * 
209                 * @return the next point
210                 */
211                private Pnt2d.PntInt findNext() {
212                        // start search for next region pixel at (u,v):
213                        int u = (first) ? uCur : uCur + 1;
214                        int v = vCur;
215                        first = false;
216                        while (v <= vMax) {
217                                while (u <= uMax) {
218                                        if (segmentation.getLabel(u, v) == label) { // next pixel found (uses surrounding labeling)
219                                                uCur = u;
220                                                vCur = v;
221                                                return PntInt.from(uCur, vCur);
222                                        }
223                                        u++;
224                                }
225                                v++;
226                                u = uMin;
227                        }
228                        uCur = uMax + 1;        // just to make sure we'll never enter the loop again
229                        vCur = vMax + 1;
230                        return null;            // no next pixel found
231                }
232
233                @Override
234                public boolean hasNext() {
235                        if (pNext != null) {    // next element has been queried before but not consumed
236                                return true;
237                        }
238                        else {
239                                pNext = findNext();     // keep next pixel coordinates in pNext
240                                return (pNext != null);
241                        }
242                }
243
244                // Returns: the next element in the iteration
245                // Throws: NoSuchElementException - if the iteration has no more elements.
246                @Override
247                public PntInt next() {
248                        if (pNext != null || hasNext()) {
249                                PntInt pn = pNext;
250                                pNext = null;           // "consume" pNext
251                                return pn;
252                        }
253                        else {
254                                throw new NoSuchElementException();
255                        }
256                }
257
258                @Override
259                public void remove() {
260                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
261                }
262
263        } // end of class RegionPixelIterator
264
265} // end of class BinaryRegion
